item.title: EP 169 - Bloody Mary: Hell's Hottest Demon
item.itunes:title: Bloody Mary: Hell's Hottest Demon
item.description:
Today we find two skeletons in the woods and then we explore the legend of Bloody Mary!

When the skeletons of two children are found in the woods, police begin a decade long investigation. Will they ever find the culprit?

And then we talk about Bloody Mary. Who is she, where did she come from, and more importantly: is she single?

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

Bloody Mary (folklore)

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bloody_Mary_%28folklore%29

 

Explaining the Legend of Bloody Mary in the Mirror

https://www.thoughtco.com/bloody-mary-in-the-mirror-3299478

 

Where did the legend of Bloody Mary come from?

https://people.howstuffworks.com/bloody-mary-legend.htm

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
